alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:38PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of western Thomas and eastern Sherman Counties through 115 PM MDT/215 PM CDT/... At 1238 PM MDT/138 PM CDT/, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Brewster to 5 miles east of Goodland to 8 miles southeast of Ruleton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 50 mph. Blowing dust with reduced visibility also possible. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewster and Levant. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 16 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This thunderstorm will produce strong winds resulting in areas of near zero visibility in blowing dirt. Use extreme caution if you must travel and be alert for rapidly changing visibility.
